title: Conflicts between Known Cartel Group and Security Forces in Nuevo Leon, Mexico
name: Conflicts between Known Cartel Group and Security Forces in Nuevo Leon, Mexico

properties.event summary: 10/23/2011: On Sunday, in an unspecified rural area between the ranches of La Laja and El Oregano in Doctor Gonzalez, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, military personnel were attacked by gunmen.  The military personnel returned fire killing one individual, identified as "Cochiloco," who was allegedly in charge of Los Zetas criminal activities in Doctor Gonzalez, Higueras, Marin, and Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon. Four other individuals escaped. The assailants started attack when military personnel witnessed them burying four bodies for apparently refusing to work with the assailants. No casualties for military personnel were reported.
properties.event title: One Killed in Armed Assault in Doctor Gonzalez, Nuevo Leon
properties.location: The attack took place in an unspecified rural area between the ranches of La Laja and El Oregano in Doctor Gonzalez, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.

properties.event summary: 11/08/2011: On Tuesday morning at 0700, in El Potosi community, Galeana, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, four Los Zetas gunmen using rifles and pistols assaulted military personnel. Ignacio Lopez Alvarado, Reyna Sanjuanita Flores Martinez, Javier Hinojosa Aldape (AKA John Cena) and Jorge (AKA El Tiko) opened fire on the soldiers when they arrived to the area after the soldiers had received an anonymous call alerting them to the presence of armed men. Two of the gunmen were injured and hospitalized. No group claimed responsibility for the attack.
properties.event title: Four Zetas Confront Military Personnel in Galeana, Nuevo Leon
properties.location: The attack took place in El Potosi community, Galeana, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.

properties.event summary: 12/02/2011: On Friday evening at 1800, in General Bravo, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, alleged Golfo Cartel members attacked military personnel with gunfire and grenade explosions. A soldier died during the confrontation and two more were wounded but reported in stable condition. It was claimed that two other off-duty military personnel went missing but this has not been confirmed. Military personnel returned fire and seized contraband from the assailants. No damages were reported. No group claimed responsibility but the Golfo Cartel is suspected.
properties.event title: Criminals Attack Soldiers in General Bravo, Nuevo Leon
properties.location: The assault occurred in General Bravo, Nuevo Leon, Mexico.
